EmailTemplate.name: CONCUR PROFILE CREATION (US)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Concur profile has been created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Concur profile has been created and instructions to record travel and expenses have been sent under separate cover. The email will come from GBS_NA_TravelExpense@beamsuntory.com and includes important information on the following:
Single Sign On and Concur mobile app usage (for both Beam and personal phones) Setting up personal banking information (required to begin submitting expenses) Verification of your email address to enable e-receipt functionality Travel profile setup Important information regarding business partnerships with companies such as Uber and Amazon for Business
The email will arrive in your inbox shortly. Please be sure to reach out to T&E at GBS_NA_TravelExpense@beamsuntory.com for more information or if you have any questions/concerns. Thank you!
